analysis.description:
HammerChain.sendFounders (/unique_chucks/21/0xc96fe3e9e111c5f70cb1585d3740d2ecc294f5c6.sol#113-122) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- timeFounders == 0x0 || timeFounders < now

HammerChain.sendFounders (/unique_chucks/21/0xc96fe3e9e111c5f70cb1585d3740d2ecc294f5c6.sol#113-122) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- timeFounders == 0x0 || timeFounders < now
HammerChain.sendIncentive (/unique_chucks/21/0xc96fe3e9e111c5f70cb1585d3740d2ecc294f5c6.sol#98-113) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- timeIncentive == 0x0

HammerChain.COMMUNITY_POOL_ADDR should be constant (/unique_chucks/21/0xc96fe3e9e111c5f70cb1585d3740d2ecc294f5c6.sol#27-28)
HammerChain.FOUNDATION_POOL_ADDR should be constant (/unique_chucks/21/0xc96fe3e9e111c5f70cb1585d3740d2ecc294f5c6.sol#26-27)
HammerChain.FOUNDERS_POOL_ADDR should be constant (/unique_chucks/21/0xc96fe3e9e111c5f70cb1585d3740d2ecc294f5c6.sol#28-30)
